explains: n. [医] 纤维化，[病理] 纤维变性
wordGroup: cystic fibrosis 囊胞性纤维症

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the commonest fatal hereditary disease.
sentences.cn: 囊性纤维化是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

sentences.en: Cystic fibrosis is the most common fatal genetic disease in the United States.
sentences.cn: 囊肿性纤维化在美国是最常见的致命性遗传疾病。

sentences.en: People with cystic fibrosis, however, are unable to fight off such bacteria, even though their lungs produce normal amounts of the antibiotic.
sentences.cn: 然而，患有囊性纤维化的人却无法抵抗这种细菌，即使他们的肺部能产生正常数量的抗生素。
